title: Posh Events Spa and Wine day
desc: Enjoy a day at Premier Spa 57, ?Transportantion is ?provided at the cost of 30 dollars. This is a live social event where cultures food and fun comes alive. Bring a friend along to enjoy all the amenities the spa has to offer from ice cold ?sauna, heated sauna, steam sauna, Hydro massage therapy pools, nude pools, lounge area and several other spa treatments and amenities. Pick up will be in Brooklyn and we will be transported by van into Manhattan and back into Brooklyn at the end of the night. Contact us at Posh Events on Instragram via direct message for ?details.
